english.segment1: Breathe on me, oh breath of God . Breathe on me until I feel the Spirit move . Breathe on me, oh breath of God . Breathe on me until all I want is You
english.segment2: Chorus: That I may love what You love . That I may do what You would do . That I may love what You love . And do what You would do
english.segment4: Father I call upon Your name . Break down all of me that remains. Fill me from crown to heel with passion
